name: .TAPESTRY
summary: Learn about .TAPESTRY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open TAPESTRY files with Tapestry on an iOS device. To open a TAPESTRY file:
Open Tapestry settings, and tap Connectors, then select Add a Connector.
Choose the TAPESTRY file you want to open and install.
Go to Settings â†’ Connectors, and select the connector.
